document_data.caption: A map showing Aurora's (labeled #24) north of Fillet Lane.
document_data.name: Aurora's Realms Shop
document_data.aliases: Aurora's Realms Shop, Slut Street Catalogue Counter
document_data.inhabitants: Inhabitants of Aurora's Realms Shop, Slut Street Catalogue Counter
document_data.mainbody: '''Aurora's Realms Shop, Slut Street Catalogue Counter''' was an outlet of the [[Aurora's Emporium]] retail chain in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was one of six such outlets in the city.
document_data.Location: It was located on [[Zastrow Street]] (formerly Slut Street), next door to the [[Purple Palace]] [[festhall]] (with a narrow side alley separating them) and two doors up from the [[Old Xoblob Shop]].
document_data.Description: It was located in a three-story-high tenement building of unremarkable appearance.
document_data.Services:
This shop sold the various items found in ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue (in-universe)|Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]''. Opening hours were dawn to dusk. 

The nearby Old Xoblob Shop was not a competitor for the catalogue counter, as the curio shop sold everything Aurora's did not, could not, or would not.
document_data.Staff: In the mid-1360s [[DR]], [[Aglatha Shrey]] worked here as a counter clerk and [[Beradyx Halfwinter]]  was a transportation mage who delivered goods to the store by [[teleport]]ing them. In addition, there were two brawny guards who worked during opening hours.
